title: Dom Amore Sunday Read : Meet UConn new quarterback , tweaks at the TPC and more
body_text:
Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...
Can Nick Evers be the program-changer UConn football needs at quarterback? At least we know things won't look the same in 2024. … Tweaks at the TPC could spice up the Travelers Championship … Why are position players pitching? … And more for The Sunday Read.
